div.div: A brief history of the long and winding emotional journey between fleetwood mac, aphex twin, and deadmau5.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Tuo5Ik&via=Digg&text=Of Mic3 And Men

div.a: Drunk Woman On YouTube Is Furious About Obama's Election

div.div: Don't worry about the blurry picture. Don't worry about the video's epic length. Just make sure there are no small children about and press play.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/RG0sQS&via=Digg&text=Drunk Woman On YouTube Is Furious About Obama's Election

div.div: ALSO, HOW NOT TO PARK A BENTLEY

div.a: How Not To Tow A Bentley

div.div: In the aftermath of Hurricane Sandy, there are cars all over the place that were severely wounded by the storm and are now being towed to mechanics and homes around the tri-state area. The problem is that some tow truck operators aren't really doing it with much care.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Z0RkIm&via=Digg&text=How Not To Tow A Bentley

div.a: Fox Discovers Constant Lying Isn’t An Effective Electoral Strategy

div.div: Fox knows that the sort of people who clog its airwaves on normal, regularly scheduled programming days — and especially prime time — are liars, phonies, wackos and con men. But what happens when people listen to them on election night?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/RJePCo&via=Digg&text=Fox Discovers Constant Lying Isn’t An Effective Electoral Strategy

div.div: HINT: IT'S NOT LEGAL IN THE RED AREA
Three new states say yes to gay marriage, including the first ever below the Mason-Dixon line.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/SC8XKr&via=Digg&text=The New Gay Marriage Map

div.a: The Power Of The Reddit Vote

div.div: The power of a Reddit campaign stop depends on the candidate and how they use it.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/SCeBfs&via=Digg&text=The Power Of The Reddit Vote

div.div: If you happen to be in Japan from now to March 31, 2013, make sure to check out one of Japan's most stunning displays of light called Winter Illuminations at Nabana no Sato, a botanical garden turned light theme park on the island of Nagashima in Kuwana.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/VLVrV7&via=Digg&text=Japan's Spectacular Tunnel Of Lights

div.a: Does Spending Billions Of Dollars On Campaign Ads Stimulate The Economy?

div.div: Heavy spending on campaign television advertisements is like a textbook example of things that don't boost the economy.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/U9DVJ4&via=Digg&text=Does Spending Billions Of Dollars On Campaign Ads Stimulate The Economy?

div.a: Mitt Romney: Wall Street's Second Worst Bet Of 2012

div.div: Sorry, derivatives traders at JP Morgan Chase. Your bank’s notorious London Whale will likely retain the dubious honor of being Wall Street’s worst trade of 2012. But the financial sector’s collective bet on Mitt Romney is going to be up there on the list too.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/SBOtBe&via=Digg&text=Mitt Romney: Wall Street's Second Worst Bet Of 2012

div.a: The Best And Worst Fictional Presidents

div.div: From Harrison Ford to Jack Nicholson, many actors have taken a spin in the Oval Office. The Daily Beast offers a look at the best (and worst) fictional presidents in film and TV.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UfETcx&via=Digg&text=The Best And Worst Fictional Presidents

div.a: Why The Cloud Is Not As Safe As It Sounds

div.div: Amazon Web Services is the world's largest hosting location, so even minor server issues make it feel like the entire Internet is breaking. But why?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/SNIonG&via=Digg&text=Why The Cloud Is Not As Safe As It Sounds

div.a: Airbnb Steps In To Help Those Affected By Sandy

div.div: This is how you help a city. Instead of trying to profit off a dire situation, Airbnb has built a platform that makes a show of compassion that much easier.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/SSWh4R&via=Digg&text=Airbnb Steps In To Help Those Affected By Sandy

div.a: How Much Bandwidth Does Netflix Use?

div.div: Netflix users are turning into the biggest data hogs in North America, a new report suggests.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/PE9r55&via=Digg&text=How Much Bandwidth Does Netflix Use?

div.a: Mars Curiosity Team Switches Back To Earth Time

div.div: After three months working on "Mars time," the team operating NASA Mars rover Curiosity has switched to more regular hours, as planned.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/U9VcSr&via=Digg&text=Mars Curiosity Team Switches Back To Earth Time

div.div: DOWNLOAD AS FAST AS YOU CAN

div.a: Egyptian Prosecutor Orders A Ban On Internet Porn

div.div: Egypt's state prosecutor on Wednesday ordered a ban on Internet pornography, after a previous court order to do so was not implemented.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Z0ZDDU&via=Digg&text=Egyptian Prosecutor Orders A Ban On Internet Porn

div.div: PROBABLY TASTES BETTER THAN IT LOOKS

div.a: How 'Top Chef' Makes Viewers Love Food They Can’t Taste

div.div: What makes the food on Top Chef look so good? Sandee Birdsong, the show’s supervising culinary producer, talks about what goes into creating the show’s signature "food porn."

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/WAHnDY&via=Digg&text=How 'Top Chef' Makes Viewers Love Food They Can’t Taste

div.a: Did People Outside The U.S. Care About The Election?

div.div: While everything stopped here in America to watch the alleged nail-biter, or what the TV told us would be a nail-biter, how did the rest of the world react?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/U9RVm3&via=Digg&text=Did People Outside The U.S. Care About The Election?

div.a: DC Brings Comics To Kindle, Nook, And iBookstore

div.div: DC Comics is making all of its periodical comic books, like Superman, Batman and Wonder Woman, available digitally through Amazon, Barnes & Noble and Apple.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/PEuCnB&via=Digg&text=DC Brings Comics To Kindle, Nook, And iBookstore

div.div: Instagram's new web profiles are beautiful—the most beautiful part of Facebook mixed with the lushness of your favorite photo app. A fine pair. The only downside is that now anyone can look at all of your uploads.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/U9Mcwr&via=Digg&text=Instagram's Stranger Danger

div.a: The Worst Fonts In The World

div.div: In "Just My Type," Simon Garfield counts down his least favorite typefaces. Shockingly, Comic Sans isn't among them.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/vkgKoN&via=Digg&text=The Worst Fonts In The World

div.div: Like everything else, filthy letters are likely going mobile.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/ST0R3c&via=Digg&text=Did Sexting Kill Cybersex?

div.div: Just before Monday night’s game, NFL Commissioner Roger Goodell told a group of fans that football on TV — and HDTV especially — may be the biggest problem the game has right now.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/ReYAwO&via=Digg&text=Is TV Killing The NFL?

div.a: Why Are Couples So Mean To Single People?

div.div: In a world that celebrates romance and finding The One, people can be rather rude to single people.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/YFBwLE&via=Digg&text=Why Are Couples So Mean To Single People?

div.div: Given the portability of the devices and all the capabilities they offer, it's no wonder tablet owners are voracious multi-taskers—in fact, fully 90 percent of them do something else while using their tablets, and multi-tasking accounts for 40 percent of their tablet time.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/RV9rKE&via=Digg&text=How Tablet Owners Multitask
